dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 127 IH: Transportation for Heroes Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Al Green of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to urbanized area formula grants, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Transportation for Heroes Act of 2017.
Section 5307(c)(1)(D) of title 49, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (ii) by striking and at the end;
in clause (iii) by inserting and after the semicolon at the end; and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: veteran (as such term is defined in section 101 of title 38);
